name: <core_simd::vector::Simd<i16, 16> as core_simd::to_bytes::ToBytes>::to_be_bytes

core_simd::simd::num::int::SimdInt::swap.doc: Reverses the byte order of each element.

core_simd::to_bytes::ToBytes::to_ne_byte.doc:
Returns the memory representation of this integer as a byte array in native byte
 order.
